artist: Painter: Meindert Hobbema; Etcher: Carl Guillaume Weisbrod; Publisher: Etienne Léon Poignant; Publisher: Pierre François Basan
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate in black: [ M. Hobbema pinx   Weisbrod sculp/ Tiré du Cabinet de Mr. le Brun/ D' aprés le Tableau Original de M. Hobbema de la grandeur de 12 pouces !/2 sur 11, de hauteur/ Se vend á Paris chez Basan et Poignant Mds. d' Estampes, rue et Hôtel Serpente];  on sheet in pencil: [1-239   2]; on verso in pencil: [245/(?)/W/D]
life_date: Meindert Hobbema, Painter, Dutch, 1638–1709; Carl Guillaume Weisbrod, Etcher, German/French, 1743–1806; Etienne Léon Poignant, Publisher, French, 1773–1791 (active); Pierre François Basan, Publisher, French, 1723–1797
portfolio: Gallerie des peintres flamands, hollandais et allemands de Le Brun
title: River scene with small passenger boat, fishermen; trees in foreground and windmill in back
